metadata.title: CVE-2014-3555 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
OpenStack Neutron before 2013.2.4, 2014.x before 2014.1.2, and Juno beforeJuno-2 allows remote authenticated users to cause a denial of service(crash or long firewall rule updates) by creating a large number of allowedaddress pairs.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-3555` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

neutron-common - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1
neutron-dhcp-agent - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1
neutron-l3-agent - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1
neutron-lbaas-agent - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1
neutron-metadata-agent - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1
neutron-metering-agent - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-bigswitch - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-bigswitch-agent - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-brocade - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-cisco - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-hyperv - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-ibm - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-ibm-agent - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-linuxbridge - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-linuxbridge-agent - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-metaplugin - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-metering-agent - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-midonet - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-ml2 - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-mlnx - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-mlnx-agent - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-nec - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-nec-agent - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-nicira - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-oneconvergence - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-oneconvergence-agent - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-openflow-agent - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-openvswitch - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-openvswitch-agent - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-plumgrid - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-ryu - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-ryu-agent - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-vmware - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1

neutron-vpn-agent - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1
python-neutron - 1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: neutron package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2014.1.2-0ubuntu1').
